document.full_text: thai and cambodian troops clashed for a third straight day on sunday over their disputed border, with gunfire and explosions echoing through mountainous jungle for several hours despite a call for a ceasefire by u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon.
document.title: clashes erupt for third day on thai-cambodian border
lines_and_colors: thai and cambodian troops clashed for a third straight day on sunday over their disputed border, with gunfire and explosions echoing through mountainous jungle for several hours despite a call for a ceasefire by u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon.
